data.title: Recurrent Energy
data.meta_description: Recurrent Energy is one of the world’s largest and most geographically diversified utility-scale solar and energy storage project development, ownership and operations platforms. With an industry-leading team of in-house energy experts, we are a wholly-owned subsidiary of Canadian Solar Inc. and function as Canadian Solar’s global development and power services business.
data.text:
Recurrent Energy to Bolster its Italian Clean Energy Portfolio with €50 Million Facility from the European Investment Bank

Recurrent Energy announced today the successful financial close on a €50 million loan from the European Investment Bank (“EIB”).

Read More

Recurrent Energy Granted Development Consent Order for its 350MWp Mallard Pass Solar Farm in UK

GUELPH, ON, July 16, 2024 – Recurrent Energy, a subsidiary of Canadian Solar Inc. (“Canadian Solar”) (NASDAQ: CSIQ) and a global developer, owner, and operator of solar and

Recurrent Energy Signs PPA with GKN Automotive for 115 MWp Rey I Project in Spain

Recurrent Energy announced today that it has signed a 10-year Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) with GKN Automotive, the global leader in drive systems.
